flavorText:
"That's not really an A. It's an Æ. They changed it! Wait, don't—"
—Hœbrus Væm, Aerathi librarian, last words
name: Bloodletter
originalText: When the names of three or more nonland permanents begin with the same letter, sacrifice Bloodletter. If you do, it deals 2 damage to each creature and each player.

rulings.text: This card recieved errata for its flavor text on Gatherer: http://gatherer.wizards.com/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=73979

text: When the names of three or more nonland permanents begin with the same letter, sacrifice Bloodletter. If you do, it deals 2 damage to each creature and each player.
